Reason: The configuration option 'request_timeout_in_ms' in the 'cassandra' software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. A lower timeout value may lead to quicker response times but could also increase the likelihood of timeouts and retries, potentially affecting overall system throughput and latency. On the other hand, a higher timeout value may reduce the chances of timeouts but could also result in increased resource consumption and slower response times, impacting system performance as well.
